0.title: Publications
0.content: This publication list includes peer-reviewed journal articles, conference proceedings, and preprints in theoretical computer science and mathematics. My research focuses on discrete mathematics and theoretical computer science, particularly random graph theory, consensus dynamics, and computational complexity theory.
